General.Name: UNITEKNO Co.Ltd
General.Description: UNITEKNO Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells automobile motor assembly parts in South Korea and internationally. The company offers automobile parts, such as valves, injections, batteries, EPS motor parts, gears, and ENDBELL. It also produces motor assembly lines, plastic injection moldings, and electronic parts assembling items. UNITEKNO Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
